page.title: 03Ornithology.
page.content: Due to the exclusively rural nature of the region the variety of topics researched was rather restricted.One of the fastest growing pastimes is undoubtably bird watching,as there are many people in Mid Wales interested in ornithology.We were able to gain access to the list of birds found within the region in 1900,and it was very interesting to compare that list with the species present today. The amount of woodland has decreased since 1900,and a number of hedges have been taken up on farms. However,on the whole,the nature of the habitat within the block has not altered greatly during the last 85 years.The changes have not affected the number of species within the region,to any great extent so far.
